name: Catch Fish
description:
Catch Fish is a 2d arcade singleplayer game which consists in grabbing the most amount of fish while keeping an eye out for bubbles that can refill your oxygen bar.

The game features 5 different difficulty levels!

You can also compare your scores with the rest of the world since the game features an online scoreboard for each difficulty level!

This game was created in roughly 4 days for the "Weekly Game Jam - Week 93".
That said it was really fun to work on this project and I believe I will keep updating it with new features after the Game Jam closes.

Have fun!

Click here to download the game's background music!
